item.description:
This release focuses on deeper focus rewards, clearer tree progress, and build tooling polish.

  • Continuous focus rewards with persisted daily goals and tree progress scaled to the daily target.
  • Tree overlay updates, including timed visibility, a hotkey toggle, and improved daily-only point display logic.
  • Tree spark counters, focus spark award tracking, and a force-points control for testing or adjustments.
  • Updated default focus spark reward settings and refinements to overlay positioning.
  • Fixed GitHub OAuth callback handling.
  • Repository and release tooling updates, including gitignore/LFS attributes and Sparkle script enhancements.
